meaning_str.bing:
n. 转移；调任；调离；【体】转会球员
v. 调任；调走；转学；转移
网络. 迁移；转让；转换

转移；调任；调离；【体】转会球员

转移（资产；权利；感情）；调动（工作岗位）；转让（所有权；权力等）；移交（责任、任务）；换乘；倒车；转学；（使）搬迁；转职；转存；转录（资料、音乐等）；传染（疾病）；让与
转移；迁移；调动；转运；换乘；运动员转会；财产转让；转学；转诊；（运动员）转会；（旅途中的）中转；搬迁；转印图画；转印图案；转车票；改变路线

1.en: If you need the receipt of your fund, please state so clearly in the comment section of the bank transfer order.
1.cn: 如果您的捐款需要收据，请清楚地注明在银行转账单上。

2.en: No transfer of this Contract is permitted and no subcontract is allowed to any third party without Party A's permission.
2.cn: 本合同严禁转包，未经甲方同意不得分包给第三方。

3.en: It should take only a week or two for China's national trademark authority to transfer the iPad trademark for China to Apple, Mr. Xie added.
3.cn: 谢湘辉补充说，只需一到两周时间，中国国家工商总局下属商标局就会把在中国注册的iPad商标转让给苹果。

0.en: No, but can you. Can you transfer my files so I can use them at home?
0.cn: 不，但你能不能转移我的文件，这样我可以在家里使用？

1.en: I'm going to attempt an experiment that will get you to transfer those feelings to me.
1.cn: 我准备尝试一个实验让你将这些情感转移到我身上。

2.en: Until such time as I am able to transfer my consciousness I shall remain in a secure location and interact with the world in this manner.
2.cn: 因此，在我能够转移意识之前，我的肉身将保存在一个安全地点，并借此方式同外界联系。

3.en: Thank you. Oh, you're gonna need transfer slips.
3.cn: 谢您啦。你们需要个转班证明。

5.en: Ooh, be sure to keep an eye on which credits transfer to a four-year college.
5.cn: 对了，记得注意下哪些学分是能转修成四年制大学的。

6.en: So, you don't want to transfer? Not really, sir. I'm terribly sorry. Excuse me.
6.cn: 所以你不想转部门吗？不想，真的非常抱歉。不好意思。

7.en: You don't belong here anymore as a client. We'll transfer your files to your home.
7.cn: 你不再是这里的客户了，我们会把你的文件送到你家。

8.en: If you requested to transfer, we can make that happen. If that's what you'd prefer.
8.cn: 如果你想转部门，我们可以做到。如果你想要我转走的话。

9.en: And then really that's ready. So you can either drain it or transfer it straight to the plate.
9.cn: 这就可以出锅了，可以沥干一会儿，也可直接装盘。

10.en: The time has come to dissolve the IMF. Mr. Chairman. And transfer the salvageable assets to the CIA.
10.cn: 是时候解散碟中谍小组了。主席先生。然后把其资源和人员调拨给中情局。

11.en: I'm gonna transfer all the data and bring it to you. You need to see this. I'll be in my office. Okay.
11.cn: 我把所有数据都传输一下，拿来给你看，你必须看看。我在办公室等你。好的。

12.en: I want to transfer all the women from this boat into that boat right now. As quick as you can, please.
12.cn: 女士们到另一艘船上，尽快，拜托了。

13.en: You know what we're gonna do, Matthews? We're gonna transfer out of here. Yeah. Yeah? Yeah. Lucas? Farkle?
13.cn: 你知道我们接下来打算怎么做吗，麦修斯？我们要转出这个班。卢卡斯，弗科？

14.en: They became targets, using insects to transfer the right pollen to the right plant, even over great distances.
14.cn: 这样有的放矢，即使距离很远，昆虫也能够将花粉传递到与之匹配的花朵上。

15.en: Batroc was hired anonymously to attack the Lemurian Star and he was contacted by email and paid by wire transfer.
15.cn: 巴托克被匿名雇佣袭击利莫里亚之星，他们用电子邮件联系，费用是电子转账的。

16.en: Theresa may have been trying to use the woodcutter as a mule, and when that failed, then may have tried to do the transfer personally.
16.cn: 特蕾莎或许之前想利用伐木工代劳，但后来失败了，她便想亲自来完成传输。

17.en: The children in the Caterpillar Room are not age-appropriate for me and my friends. We respectfully request a transfer to the Butterfly Room.
17.cn: 毛毛虫小儿室的孩子们对我和我的朋友来说不合适，我们很恳请去蝴蝶屋。

18.en: I'd see this a lot in narcotics. People who know their money's being watched just transfer their funds to somewhere much less monitored. Less monitored. Like where?
18.cn: 我在调查毒品案件的时候看过很多类似的事情。人们知道自己的钱一直被监管着就把他们的资金转到缺少监管的地方。缺少监管的地方。哪里？
